name: T(rip)
description:
What a trip this 2 weeks. Here, have a little game for +18... Tons of bugs. I'm bad. I can't code. I'm sorry
walkthru.txt with the build.

Made for the $102 Adventure Game Challenge hosted by Stand Off Software · #102AdvChal

Thank you so much for making the gamejam, it was great and perfect timing. Happy that I can tell stories with Unity and Fungus.  Had no idea.

My idea, art and music. Used SFX from freesounds.org at the last minute.

TOOLS: Started with my brain and the idea and this got me motivated. Worked a music to get the mood in Ableton Lite. Modeled the house with cubes and spheres in Blender to have a reference. Sketched a lot in Krita. Made in Unity with the amazing tool FUNGUS! 

Have fun!

#stayalive <3
